Welcome to Life at Scout off Sunset
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 916 Sq.

Scout Off Sunset offers epic studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartment homes that strike the perfect balance between comfort and contemporary style, providing you the ultimate space to create your ideal home.
Each sun-drenched residence boasts a unique floor plan featuring spacious rooms, distinctive wood-style flooring in living areas, ample closet space, and modern kitchens.
Select apartment homes feature a personal balcony or patio.
Now’s your chance to choose your favorite floor plan and create your ultimate Hollywood home.
We are a pet-friendly community providing waste dispensers and collection points around the property.
Cross street Pointsettia and Sunset Blvd.
